data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhong, Yang, Lin, Ye-Jie, Liu, Jie (2019): First description of the male of Barylestissaaristoi Jaeger, 2008 (Araneae, Sparassidae) from China. ZooKeys 832: 153-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.32569, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.32569
